name: INfusionINsIght™
0:
”Alexa, open INfusion INsIght”
”Alexa, open INfusion INsIght and start new infusion”
”Alexa, ask INfusion INsIght for important safety information”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: infusion insight
Developer Terms of Use
des:
INfusion INsIght™ is designed for nurses who administer subcutaneous maintenance therapy to CIDP patients and is intended for informational purposes only. The skill offers step-by-step infusion instructions, FAQs and important safety information.

This skill is for health care provider use only. This skill is intended to be used along with the dosing and administration guide which includes the prescribing information for the related drug. Administration nurses should follow SOP/training of their institution if required, before using INfusion INsIght. INfusion INsIght is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Talk to your doctor to receive medical advice. To report SUSPECTED ADVERSE REACTIONS, contact Takeda Pharmaceuticals U.S.A., Inc. at 1-877-TAKEDA-7 (1-877-825-3327) or FDA at 1-800-FDA-1088 or www.fda.gov/medwatch.

There are no special instructions regarding credentials or hardware. This skill was developed by Takeda.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
